tool_description: Our ShortURL API comes with a visitor counter and advanced statistics for day, week, month, and year.
name: Short URL by NewbAPI
title: Short URL by NewbAPI

api_list.name: Total Visit query
api_list.description:
Retrieves the total visitor count for the given `UUID` within a date range.

Date format: `Y-m-d`
Example: `2023-04-01`

api_list.name: Total visit based on timeline
api_list.description:
Retrieves the total visitor count based on the given timeline and `UUID`.

Timeline:
- `latest`
- `day`
- `week`
- `month`
- `year`

api_list.name: Total visit and visitor agent data
api_list.description: Retrieves the visitor user agent for a given `UUID`.

api_list.name: Total visit
api_list.description: Retrieves the total visitor count for the given `UUID`.
